# se-block-footer

| Slot  | Description                                                             |
| ----- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| none  | Slot with no name will be positioned to the start of the element (left) |
| `end` | Positions to the `right` of the content.                                |

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                                                                                                                                    | Type                | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| `direction` | `direction` |                                                                                                                                                                                                | `"column" \| "row"` | `"row"`     |
| `option`    | `option`    | Defines the visual appearance of a footer. Updated automatically by the `se-block` component when on card option. `card` will update the design of the footer with respect to the card design. | `"card"`            | `undefined` |
